name: BEERMKR
description: For beer lovers who want to make beer but can't due to its complexity, cost, time and equipment requirements, BEERMKR provides a fast, simple, and easy way to make award winning beer. BEERMKR is a hardware + consumable revenue company.
one_liner: For beer lovers who want to make beer but can't due to its complexity, cost, time and equipment requirements, BEERMKR provides a fast, simple, and easy way to make award winning beer. BEERMKR is a hardware + consumable revenue company.
